text: ULB may refer to: *"Ultralight Beam", a song by American hip hop artist Kanye West *Underwater locator beacon, a device fitted to aviation flight recorders *Free University of Brussels (Université libre de Bruxelles), a university in Belgium between 1834 and 1969 *Université libre de Bruxelles, a university in Belgium from 1970 onwards *Urban local body, a representative body in India
title: ULB
